response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting over a decade of innovation and dedication. Considering its unparalleled quality and unique features, we are extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for discerning buyers like yourself. We believe that you will appreciate its craftsmanship and find immense satisfaction in owning such a remarkable piece. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this extraordinary product with you.", "product_price": 950000}
